name: Satr Wras - The Return Of The Chicken
name_original: Satr Wras - The Return Of The Chicken
description:
Controls:

  • Mouse: aim
  • A: move left
  • D: move right
  • S: push down
  • Space/W: jump
  • R: restart (when dead)
  • Left click: attack with laser saber
  • Middle click: force push
  • Right click: block with laser saber
  • Left Ctrl + Left Shit + G: God Mode
